commands.name: ci-build
commands.summary: Slow rebuild all and run lint and tests, clearing everything before hand.

commands.name: incremental-build
commands.summary: A minimal rebuild without clearing anything, good for fast iteration.

commands.name: ci-test
commands.summary: Run the tests, useful in conjunction with incremental-build.

commands.name: generate-docs
commands.summary: Create per package documentation, requires build to have been run. Run rollup-docs after to get something readable.

commands.name: rollup-docs
commands.shellCommand: node common/scripts/copy-api-docs.js && api-documenter markdown --input-folder tmp --output-folder docs
commands.summary: To be run after ci-build or generate-docs, produces the human readable docs.

commands.name: copy-examples
commands.summary: Copies examples into docs folder, run last.
